parameters.definition: Cost of manufacturing a regular handbag
Cost of manufacturing a premium handbag
Maximum number of handbags that can be sold per month

description: A fashion company sells regular handbags and premium handbags made of higher quality material. They can sell regular handbags at a profit of \param{ProfitRegular} each and premium handbags at a profit of \param{ProfitPremium} each. The total monthly cost of manufacturing is \param{CostRegular} per regular handbag and \param{CostPremium} per premium handbag. The company has a total budget of \param{Budget} and can sell at most \param{MaxHandbags} handbags of either type per month. How many of each handbag should they sell to maximize its monthly profit?
